page.title: 14ATTITUDES
page.content: There is a feeling that a sports or { {leisure centre}is needed in Morpeth.The facilities for children are not really good enough.The {local {park}has only got one slide and a climbing frame.It is not a safe place in which to play as the ground is covered with broken glass.{Carlisle {Park }in Morpeth is disliked by more local people than like it.They think that the equipment needs to be better looked after and more exciting.The{Local Council }has proposed that Morpeth Parish should become responsible for maintaining the playground equipment.A leisure centre would provide sports facilities for the whole family.In Morpeth {parking} is expensive.Everyone would like to see {free parking}for residents who maybe want to do a quick shop.
